name: Pizza ai funghi sospetta
desc: A pizza covered in cheese and mushrooms. If you can bite through the brick-like texture... At least it can ease your hunger.

value.text: Restores 26% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates 450 HP every 5s for 30s.

value.name: Ricetta: pizza ai funghi
value.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making a Mushroom Pizza.

value.name: Fungo
value.desc: Hardy common fungi. Can grow anywhere with the right amount of shade and moisture.

value.name: Farina
value.desc: A powder ground from wheat. No matter what it goes into, it brings a sense of satisfaction to the diner.

value.name: Cavolo
value.desc: A layered, leafy vegetable. Said to have originally been an ornamental plant, it certainly looks great in the pot.

value.name: Formaggio
value.desc: Made from fermented milk. High in energy, it's used in a wide range of dishes.

value.name: Pizza ai funghi deliziosa
value.desc: A pizza covered in cheese and mushrooms. It's a party in your mouth and the cheese and mushrooms invited all their delicious friends.

value.name: Pizza ai funghi
value.desc: A pizza covered in cheese and mushrooms. When still warm, the cheese becomes stretchy and gooey, making it extremely satisfying to eat.
